but BPG is not responsible for any technical malfunction or undelivered email messages .IT IS YOUR RESPONSIBILITY TO CHECK THE WEBSITE ADDRESS ABOVE AFTER THE CONCLUSION OF THIS SWEEPSTAKES TO SEE IF YOU ARE A POTENTIAL GRAND PRIZE WINNER .Once a potential Grand Prize Winner has been verified to the satisfaction of BPG , BPG will arrange for prize fulfillment to that Winner .Depending on the type and source of the prize , prize fulfillment may take up to eight ( 8) weeks from the date of verification .Any verified Winner who has not received his / her prize at the end of that time should contact BPG .If a potential Grand Prize Winner is determined to be ineligible by BPG or fails to respond within the required time period , that potential Grand Prize Winner forfeits his / her prize and is disqualified .Prizes .A maximum of 1 " Grand Prize " consisting of a iPad Mini ( $ 529.00 ) may be awarded .Total actual retail value of all prizes will not exceed $ 529.00 .Winners are responsible for all taxes and fees associated with prize receipt and/or use .Odds of Winning .The odds of winning will depend on the number of eligible Personal Entries and Bonus Personal Entries received .Many will enter , few will win .Release .Limitations of Liability .No more than the stated number of prizes will be awarded .

and winning is contingent upon fulfilling all requirements .The potential prize winner will be notified by email after the date of the drawing or at the end of the Promotion .Only the Grand Prize Promotion winner will be contacted for Prize Verification .If a potential winner of any prize can not be contacted within 3 business days , he / she forfeits the prize .In the event that a potential winner is disqualified for any reason or a prize winner declines a prize , Sponsor will award the applicable prize to an alternate winner .There will be one ( 1 ) alternate drawing for the Grand Prize after which the Promotion prize will remain un - awarded .Unclaimed Grand Prize will remain un - awarded .All prizes will be fulfilled to each winner after conclusion of the Promotion .Allow approximately 8 - 10 weeks for delivery of all prizes .PRIZE GIVEAWAY AND APPROXIMATE RETAIL VALUE : .Grand Prize Winner : One ( 1 ) Prize No cash equivalent will be awarded and all prizes are non - transferable and no substitution will be made except as provided herein at the Sponsor 's sole discretion .

Sweepstakes is subject to all applicable federal , state and local laws and regulations .ENTRY : Multiple entries are allowed and there are 3 ways to enter .For example , if your purchase total is $ 92.50 you will be entered into the contest 9 times .If your total was $ 92.50 , but then you used a 10 % off coupon code , making your total $ 83.25 , you will be entered into the contest 8 times .The box opting you into the contest must be checked in order for your entry to be verified .Returning any purchase will remove your entries for the dollar amount refunded .3 ) You may also gain an entries for sharing the information of the contest with others .You may share the information using Facebook , Twitter , or by email .Once the person you shared the information with enters the contest by using the link you provided through the email , Facebook or Twitter post , then you will gain another entry into the contest .If multiple people click on the link , you will receive an entry for each separate person who enters the giveaway .LIMIT : There is no limit on the total amount of entries .In the event of a dispute , online entries will be deemed to have been submitted by the Authorized Account Holder of the email address submitted at the time of entry . "Authorized Account Holder " means the natural person who is assigned to an email address by an Internet access provider , online service provider , or other organization that is responsible for assigning email addresses for the domain associated with the submitted email address .Participants may not register with multiple email addresses nor may entrants use any device or artifice to register multiple times or as multiple registrants .Any Participant who attempts to enter with multiple email addresses under multiple identities or uses any device or artifice to enter multiple times will be disqualified and forfeits any and all prizes won , in Sponsor 's discretion .PRIZE / APPROXIMATE RETAIL VALUE("ARV")/ODDS : One ( 1 ) Grand Prize .Winner will receive one ( 1 ) set of Google Glass .ARV of Grand Prize to be rewarded is $ 1,500 .All prize details are at the Sponsor 's sole discretion .Odds of winning will depend upon the total number of eligible entries received .RANDOM DRAWING/ NOTIFICATION : Potential grand prize winner will be notified by email on or before December 16 , 2013 .The potential grand prize winner is requested to confirm his / her mailing address within 48 hours via return email .Prize will be sent to the address on the entry purchase or address provided via email within 2 weeks of winner being verified .PRIZE CONDITIONS : If the winner is otherwise eligible under these Official Rules , but is nevertheless deemed a minor in his or her state of primary residence , the prize will be awarded in the name of winner 's parent or legal guardian .Prize is not redeemable for cash .

total amount at checkout less the value of the coupon code .Coupon codes can not be combined with other offers or used on sale items unless otherwise specified .Sole Society may run promotions designed to attract new customers or increase sales .Sole Society reserves the right to refuse or alter any coupon or promotion at its discretion .Please note : Coupon codes are not retroactive and price adjustments will not be issued to orders placed prior to the start of any promotion ELIGIBILITY :The Sweepstakes is open to legal residents of the 50 United States , age 18 or older at the time of entry .
